prior_knowledge_digest: Students should have a basic understanding of language learning concepts, such as vocabulary, grammar, and pronunciation. Familiarity with English grammar will be beneficial, as it will help in drawing parallels with Latin structures. No prior knowledge of Latin is required, but an openness to learning a new language and its cultural context is essential. Students should be ready to engage with new vocabulary and simple sentence structures.
yesterday_recap: N/A - This is the first day of the course.
misconception_watchlist: Assuming Latin pronunciation is identical to English
Confusing Latin word order with English
Expecting Latin to have the same grammatical rules as English

primary: Understand the concept of noun cases
